Nazel Video Downloader A free, cross-platform video download manager
About Features Download

About

Nazel Video Downloader is GUI client for the popular CLI application Youtube-dl. It has the features you need in a video downloader application and supports a very long list of video and audio streaming websites. Nazel is free, cross-platform, open source and written in Java and the JavaFX toolkit.

Platforms

Runs on the most popular desktop operating systems [ Windows, linux and macOS ]

Websites

Downloads videos from youtube, vimeo, facebook and more websites, See the complete list here

Artifacts

Not only gets video files, It can also download audio files and subtitles in your language

Features

Simple User Interface
